0.question: What is the relationship between the true market state qt and the noisy version q̂t at time t?
0.ground_truth: The noisy version q̂t at time t is equal to the true market state qt plus a sum of Laplace noise vectors obtained by following the arrows all the way back to 0.
0.answer: its a sum of noises obtained by following the arrows all the way back to 0 <s>
